mapper.insert: insert into caevoteitem (voteItemId, candidateId, candidateName, voteId, optionName, showColumnName, showColumnValue) values (#{voteitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{candidateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{candidatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voteid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showcolumnname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{showcolumnvalue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update caevoteitem set candidateId = #{candidateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, candidateName = #{candidatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, voteId = #{voteid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionName = #{optionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, showColumnName = #{showcolumnname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, showColumnValue = #{showcolumnvalue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where voteItemId = #{voteitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select voteItemId, candidateId, candidateName, voteId, optionName, showColumnName, showColumnValue from caevoteitem where voteItemId = #{voteitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
